title: (x) Centro Hospitalar de Coimbra logo - Arial {Richard}
content:
Hi!

Does anyone could help me identifying the typeface(s) used in this logo?

Should be simple, but I tried all Helveticas and similiar typefaces that I own and none matchs perfectly…

Any ideas?

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=logo_chc_hg.jpg)
author: wta

comments.content:
From this distance, it looks like Arial to me.

Richard
Pienso que es Arial también. Mira un poco estirada.
